services.name: Electronic Health Records Management
services.description: The Electronic Health Records (EHR) Management API allows healthcare providers to store, retrieve, and update patient health records securely. This service facilitates data interoperability among different healthcare systems. Providers can access patient history, lab results, and medication information in real time, improving care quality and efficiency.

services.name: Pharmaceutical Inventory Tracking
services.description: This service enables pharmacies and healthcare facilities to manage their pharmaceutical stock levels. Through stock level queries and tracking expiration dates, it ensures a seamless supply chain and reduces waste, guaranteeing that essential medications are always available when needed.

services.name: Medical Appointment Scheduling
services.description: This RESTful API supports patients and healthcare providers in scheduling and managing medical appointments. Patients can search for available time slots with specific practitioners and book appointments, while practitioners can manage their schedules and availability effectively.

services.name: Telemedicine Consultation
services.description: The Telemedicine Consultation service facilitates video conferencing between patients and healthcare providers. It includes features for secure patient-provider communication, sharing medical documents, and storing consultation records for future reference, ensuring convenient and accessible medical advice.

services.name: Health Insurance Claim Processing
services.description: This service facilitates seamless submission and processing of insurance claims associated with medical treatments. Patients and providers can submit claim details while insurance companies can review and approve claims efficiently, streamlining the reimbursement process.
